##========================================================================
## NAME
=pod

=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Temp::Array - DiaColloDB: temporary arrays

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB::Temp::Array;
 
 ##========================================================================
 ## DiaColloDB::Temp API
 
 $tied = TIEARRAY($classname, $filename, %opts);
 undef = $obj->cleanup();
 

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Temp::Array provides a simple L<tie()|perltie> interface
to large temporary arrays stored on disk.

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Temp::Array: Globals
=pod

=head2 Globals

=over 4

=item Variable: @ISA

DiaColloDB::Temp::Array inherits from
L<Tie::File::Indexed::JSON|Tie::File::Indexed::JSON>
and L<DiaColloDB::Temp|DiaColloDB::Temp>.

=back

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Temp::Array: DiaColloDB::Temp API
=pod

=head2 DiaColloDB::Temp API

=over 4

=item TIEARRAY

 $tied = TIEARRAY($classname, $filename, %opts);

honors 'UNLINK' option in %opts to auto-unlink $filename on object destruction.

=item cleanup

 undef = $obj->cleanup();

unlink temp files (only if created with 'UNLINK' option)

=back

=cut
